Class MouseEvent

java.lang.Object

          charva.awt.event.InputEvent
              charva.awt.event.MouseEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class MouseEvent
extends InputEvent

An event which encapsulates information about a mouse-click.
